shorts.title: Fidelity Bank Welcomes James Clemente, CPA, MT and Rocco A. DelVecchio to Board of Directors
shorts.title_distilled: Fidelity Bank Welcomes James Clemente, CPA, MT and Rocco A.
shorts.description: DUNMORE, Pa., Jan. 02, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Brian J. Cali, Chairman of the Board of Fidelity Bank, is pleased to announce the appointment of James Clemente, CPA, MT and Rocco A. DelVecchio to its Board of Directors.
shorts.content: DUNMORE, Pa., Jan. 02, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Brian J. Cali, Chairman of the Board of Fidelity Bank, is pleased to announce the appointment of James Clemente, CPA, MT and Rocco A. DelVecchio to its Board of Directors.

shorts.title: BREAKING: Pa. Health Department OKs Tenor Health acquisition application for 3 NEPA hospitals
shorts.description: Pennsylvania Health Department officials have given their blessing to Tenor Health Foundation's application to acquire three Northeast Pennsylvania hospitals, multiple sources said Wednesday.
shorts.content: Pennsylvania Health Department officials have given their blessing to Tenor Health Foundation's application to acquire three Northeast Pennsylvania hospitals, multiple sources said Wednesday.

shorts.title: Crews still cleaning up after train derailment
shorts.title_distilled: Crews still cleaning up after train derailment.
shorts.description: OLD FORGE, LACKAWANNA COUNTY (WBRE/WYOU)— Railroad crews are still on the scene of a train derailment in Old Forge. Our 28/22 News crew was kept at a distance from the work, where more than a dozen rail cars jumped the tracks near Moosic Road. Three of them carrying wine flipped onto their side. The crash [...]

shorts.title: Weekend Ice festival set to attract thousands
shorts.title_distilled: Weekend Ice festival set to attract thousands.
shorts.description: CLARKS SUMMIT, LACKAWANNA COUNTY (WBRE/WYOU) - The Festival of Ice is underway in Clarks Summit this weekend, featuring 49 ice sculptures on display throughout the Lackawanna County community. This year's event theme is American History and is expected to attract thousands of visitors to the area. Organizers spent a full year planning the three-day festival, [...]

shorts.title: Olympic inspiration on local ski slopes
shorts.title_distilled: Olympic inspiration on local ski slopes.
shorts.description: TANNERSVILLE, MONROE COUNTY (WBRE/WYOU) —As athletes from around the world soar through the air at the Winter Olympics, that same skill is taking place right here in northeastern Pennsylvania. Local ski resorts, like Camelback, are working hard behind the scenes to build and maintain the terrain park features that keep skiers and snowboarders flying safely. [...]
shorts.content: TANNERSVILLE, MONROE COUNTY (WBRE/WYOU) —As athletes from around the world soar through the air at the Winter Olympics, that same skill is taking place right here in northeastern Pennsylvania. Local ski resorts, like Camelback, are working hard behind the scenes to build and maintain the terrain park features that keep skiers and snowboarders flying safely. [...]

shorts.title: Fugitive, harborer arrested after 2-month search, police say
shorts.title_distilled: Fugitive, harborer arrested after 2-month search, police say.
shorts.description: SCRANTON, LACKAWANNA COUNTY (WBRE/WYOU) — A man wanted on firearm and substance possession charges was arrested along with a man who harbored him, police say. Joshua Feliciano of Scranton, 36, was arrested Jan. 20, just over two months after Scranton Police said they were searching for him on gun and drug charges. Police say Feliciano [...]
